column4: those links the bot has are to add more features (buttons/commands) to a mouse, im looking to subtract a setting. my xorg.conf has no settings for my mouse, just "configured mouse" so i cant change it there. any other ideas?

That might be more relevant.  Or a combination of the two.  The mouse buttons are probably extra mouse buttons, (7, 8,9 etc) which is configured for a small part with the first link, the second might be more relevan if they are already found, and you need to remap
omg, i am forever in your debt!!!! ive been searching for that answer for that since i installed hardy, and it was so easy. you are super great *high five*!!!!!
